title: Cannot display verbose output
body:
When running phpunit with either the `--verbose` switch or `verbose="true"` in the config file the results are reported in the "simple" form (i.e. it doesn't report which tests are being run).

When running using the command line switch I use:

```
`phpunit --bootstrap=path/to/test_bootstrap.php --verbose path/to/tests.php`
```

And when using the config file, it starts like so:

```
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<phpunit verbose="true" colors="true" bootstrap="path/to/test_bootstrap.php">
```

Version info:

```
PHP 5.3.3-1ubuntu9.3 with Suhosin-Patch (cli) (built: Jan 12 2011 16:08:14) 

Installed packages, channel pear.phpunit.de:
============================================

```
